name: @socketsupply/io

scripts.test: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm test --silent
scripts.test:android: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm run test:android --silent
scripts.test:android-emulator: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm run test:android-emulator --silent

description: javascript sugar on top of socket-sdk ipc
